biotools.summary: Bioinformatic Resource Center focused on invertebrate vectors of human pathogens. It annotates and curates vector genomes providing a web accessible integrated resource for the research community. Currently, it contains genome information for three mosquito species: Aedes aegypti, Anopheles gambiae and Culex quinquefasciatus, a body louse Pediculus humanus and a tick species Ixodes scapularis.
